  • Wired.com: How do you maintain your optimism?

    Musk: Do I sound optimistic?

    Wired.com: Yeah, you always do.

    Musk: Optimism, pessimism, fuck that; were going to make it happen. As God as my bloody witness, I'm hell-bent on making it work.

  • Direct Mail for Annihilation

    Brent: [to Killface] You fucking kidnap us, right, you drag us up here, ya shit on every strategy we come up with - and by the way, that web promotion was tiiiiiight, but the bottom line is, you don’t have the fucking budget to run with the big dogs! Now, do you! (begins making barking noises).

    --"Meet Killface", EP1S1 Frisky Dingo.

  • When I’m working on a problem, I never think about beauty. I think only how to solve the problem.

    --Fred Brooks, A Celebration of Kenneth Iverson, 2004-11-30
